resources.string:
Find out about things like important dates and deadlines, services you might find useful and new features that have been added to the app.

 By allowing notifications from the app, you also agree to share statistics about how you use the app.

 You can change your preferences at any time in the app settings.

You’ve turned on notifications for this app in your phone settings.

 By allowing notifications from the app, you also agree to share statistics about how you use the app.

 You can change your preferences at any time in your phone’s notifications settings.
